com.ami.mse.ucms.db.manager.component

Interface ComponentManager

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ComponentManagerImpl

    public interface ComponentManager
    Contains methods that processing instance of Component using EntityManager. There are methods for save and update new or existing instance. Also there are method for extraction existing record of component from the data base.
    Author:
    Tony

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      List<Component> findAll()
      Find all existing records of Component.
      Component findById(int id)
      Find instance of Component by it id.
      Component findByName(String name)
      Find instance of {@link Component by it name.
      List<Component> getComponentsForTemplate(Template template)
      Find list of Component for given Template.
      void save(Component component)
      Save instance of Component in the data base using EntityManager.
      Component update(Component component)
      Update existing instance of Component or save if the record of the inputed component do not exist in the data base.

    • Method Detail

      • save

        void save(Component component)
        Save instance of Component in the data base using EntityManager.
        Parameters:
        component - the instance of component that will be saved

      • update

        Component update(Component component)
        Update existing instance of Component or save if the record of the inputed component do not exist in the data base.
        Parameters:
        component - the component that will be updated or saved
        Returns:
        the component updated or saved component

      • findAll

        List<Component> findAll()
        Find all existing records of Component.
        Returns:
        the list of all existing Component

      • findById

        Component findById(int id)
        Find instance of Component by it id.
        Parameters:
        id - the id of the component that is searched
        Returns:
        the instance of the searched component or null if component do not exist

      • findByName

        Component findByName(String name)
        Find instance of {@link Component by it name.
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the component that is searched
        Returns:
        the instance of the searched component or null if component do not exist

      • getComponentsForTemplate

        List<Component> getComponentsForTemplate(Template template)
        Find list of Component for given Template.
        Parameters:
        template - the template for witch will be searched components
        Returns:
        list of component for the given template or empty list if there is none component for the inputed template
